title: Replace Gallery placeholders with uploaded real event photos

requirements.text: Update the existing Gallery page to use the 12 user-uploaded images instead of the current placeholder images, while keeping the existing responsive grid and lightbox behavior. Add the uploaded image files as static frontend assets and update `frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx` so `galleryImages` references those assets with appropriate English alt text/titles.

quotes: Do you want these uploaded images added to your existing Gallery page, replacing the placeholder photos?

acceptanceCriteria: The Gallery page no longer displays any `/assets/generated/gallery-*.jpg` placeholder images.
All 12 uploaded files are present as static frontend assets and load correctly in production builds.

`galleryImages` renders exactly 12 tiles using the uploaded images: IMG-20260210-WA0029.jpg, IMG-20260210-WA0020.jpg, IMG-20260210-WA0015.jpg, IMG-20260210-WA0017.jpg, IMG-20260210-WA0027.jpg, IMG-20260210-WA0029-1.jpg, IMG-20260210-WA0022.jpg, IMG-20260210-WA0024.jpg, IMG-20260210-WA0020-1.jpg, IMG-20260210-WA0016.jpg, IMG-20260210-WA0015-1.jpg, IMG-20260210-WA0017-1.jpg.
Clicking any gallery tile still opens the lightbox modal with the larger preview of the same uploaded image.
All images have non-empty, user-friendly English `alt` text and `title` values (no placeholder text like 'image 1').

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only).
Do not modify any paths listed in frontend.immutablePaths.
Keep the existing Gallery route (`/gallery`) and maintain current grid + lightbox UX.
nonGoals: Building an admin UI for managing gallery images.
Adding image upload functionality to the website at runtime.
